attributes.action: Put more Bobbies on the Beat
attributes.additional_details:
I say she is talking utter rubbish and we need more Bobbies on the beat. 

It stands to reason that more Police means higher visibility and a larger deterrent  for people thinking of committing crime. More Police means more officers dedicated to keeping our streets safe and more chance of locking up the idiotic scum that think it's ok to carry and use a knife. Even the Met Police Commissioner agrees.

MORE POLICE NOW
attributes.background: Knife crime is on the increase and the Prime Minister says it has nothing to do with cuts in Police numbers.
